description:
The iconic Harry Potter novels were famously adapted into a series of live-action films from 2001 to 2011. Now the story will be told again, as it’s been revealed that the Harry Potter TV series is officially moving forward. As shared via THR, the new series will be released on the Max streaming service. Fans [...]

The post ‘Harry Potter’ TV Series Will Debut On Max In 2026 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Harry Potter’ TV Series Will Debut On Max In 2026
